name: Pick something random
changelog: Added link to French version of the app
description:
You can ask for random numbers and dates, to flip a coin and to roll a die or multiple dice.

Some examples:

- "Heads or tails" / "Flip a coin"
- "Pick a number from 1 to 10"
- "Choose a random date in June"
- "Roll a die" / "4d12" (dice notation)

If you want to pick something random many times, you could install my app Say it again ( https://console.snips.ai/store/en/skill_YoV709qZP3n ). Then you can for instance say "Roll a die" and then multiple times "Again" to roll a new die every time.

With more complex questions for a random date, the app sometimes returns the wrong dates. That's nothing I can change: it's the Snips NLU that is returning the wrong dates. I'm collecting some example questions with wrong output for a bug report. Please send me your examples if you want to help improve Snips.

More information can be found on the GitHub page of the actions code: https://github.com/koenvervloesem/snips-app-pick-something-random

If you have some suggestions for improvements, such as new training examples or new functionality, or if you found a bug, feel free to contact me at koen@vervloesem.eu and I'll be happy to add or correct it. And if you like my app, please rate it :-)

This app also exists in French: https://console.snips.ai/store/fr/skill_9Y1Avk694al
